data.name: Demon's Mirror
data.detailed_description:
Demon's Mirror is the first game to combine roguelike deckbuilding and chain-3 mechanics in a way that creates a powerful synergy between the two. Like other deckbuilders, you battle enemies by playing cards to attack, defend, and gain powers, but in Demon's mirror you also battle opponents by chaining tiles. Certain cards let you manipulate the board in ways that will allow you to create longer chains. Mastering the strategic balance between playing cards and chaining tiles is what will ultimately determine your fate.

Demon's Mirror plays like a combination of Slay the Spire meets Puzzle Quest (but with a chain-3 mechanic).

Play cards to battle enemies.


Play cards to manipulate the board and set up longer chains. In this gif a card is played that creates a universal tile, which is used to bridge a gap between several attack tiles.


Enemies can place tiles that will damage you.


Damage and destroy enemy tiles by chaining them. Certain cards also let you damage enemy tiles.

What To Expect

  • The game has roguelike elements so no playthrough is ever the same
  • Encounter challenging enemies that have distinctive move sets. They will make you think about how to defeat them instead of mindlessly playing cards and chaining tiles until you win or lose
  • Fill your deck with the perfect set of cards to both directly battle your opponent and to manipulate the game board
  • Chain tiles to attack, defend, gain Willpower (the purple gems) and Essence (the green tiles). Collecting enough Willpower triggers your character's Super move. Essence is automatically spent when playing certain cards to make them more powerful
  • Find or purchase one-time use scrolls from the shopkeeper. Scrolls have a wide range of uses such as instantly gaining more action points, a strength buff, or making your next "tile chain" free
  • Discover powerful artifacts that will give you exciting new powers and potentially change your strategy for that run
  • Encounter random events where you'll make interesting choices, meet strange creatures, and uncover secrets about the world

Break The Loop

You've been here before, possibly thousands of times... and the journey ahead of you is going to take everything you have. Only you can bring balance to the chaos. Can you survive a trip through the mirror?

data.short_description: Demon's Mirror is a roguelike deckbuilder with a unique chain-3 battle system. Choose to play powerful cards and chain tiles (in any order) to attack and defend against the enemy. Gain ever increasing powers as you traverse through a world filled with your worst nightmares.
